Question & Options:
In the 2001 movie 'Donnie Darko', what book is the film's concept of time travel and alternate universes based on?
Options:

B. A Wrinkle in Time by Madeleine L'Engle
C. A Brief History of Time by Stephen Hawking
D. The Theory of Everything by Stephen Hawking
Correct Answer: A Brief History of Time by Stephen Hawking

Question & Options:
In the 2001 movie 'Donnie Darko', why did Kelly insist on setting the film in 1988?
Options:
A. He wanted to explore the 1980s era
B. He wanted to depict a society that had not been shown in a film before
C. He thought it would be fresh to explore the era and depict a society that he had not seen in a film before
D. He was born in 1988
Correct Answer: He thought it would be fresh to explore the era and depict a society that he had not seen in a film before

Correct Answer: To ground the supernatural story in a scientific sense
